thread.title: SWISSGEAR.com Announces 'Ultimate Backpack' Scholarship Winners
thread.title_full: SWISSGEAR.com Announces 'Ultimate Backpack' Scholarship Winners - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: SWISSGEAR.com Announces 'Ultimate Backpack' Scholarship Winners
text:
SWISSGEAR.com
FORT LAUDERDALE, Fla. , Oct. 20, SWISSGEAR.com congratulates Magdalene Beck , Claire Rice and Ian Portwood on winning the SWISSGEAR.com 'Ultimate Backpack' Scholarship .
Photo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20151019/278459
SWISSGEAR.com offered one $5,000 scholarship and two $2,500 scholarships for a creative submission to three students to assist with pursuing their education, demonstrating their definition on what makes the ideal backpack.
Winning first place for the $5,000 scholarship reward, Magdalene Beck is a sophomore at the University of Virginia and intends to major in Government or Public Policy with a minor in Spanish. The second place winner of one of the $2,500 scholarship rewards was Claire Rice , a student at the University of Central Florida's 'Florida Interactive Entertainment Academy' under the Art Track, majoring in Masters of Science in Interactive Entertainment. The third place winner of the second $2,500 scholarship reward was Ian Portwood , a junior at the University of Central Florida , and is majoring in Finance.
The scholarship opportunity was opened to both high school seniors and any student enrolled in an undergraduate or graduate degree program by August 1, 2015 at any accredited U.S. college, university or institute. The scholarship represented the first of an annual effort by SWISSGEAR to give back to a section of the backpack community that has loved its products throughout the brand's long and prominent history. Each applicant was required to submit an essay of 500 words or less describing what makes the "ultimate" backpack. Thousands of entries were received but Magdalene, Claire, and Ian were able to differentiate themselves by expressing the personal and deep seeded connection a person can have with their backpack. They are truly companions for life's many journeys and it gives SWISSGEAR a great sense of fulfillment and pride knowing that they can play a vital role in providing that perfect companion.
The winners were also announced via SWISSGEAR's Instagram , Twitter , and Facebook .
About SWISSGEAR.com
SWISSGEAR.com is the official online retail destination of SWISSGEAR luggage , SWISSGEAR backpacks, travel accessories, belts and wallets. Committed to offering the finest selection SWISSGEAR products, SWISSGEAR.com understands that everyone's needs vary greatly which is why they carry everything from a 20" carry-on spinner to a hanging toiletry kit to a back to school and a ScanSmartâ„¢ TSA-friendly backpack. Built on trust, quality and innovation, SWISSGEAR is the brand that consumers have come to rely on for providing well made products that are intelligently designed, highly functional and remarkably durable. For more information, please visit www.SWISSGEAR.com or call 1-844-MY-SWISS.
